product_name: Sea to Summit CoolMax Adaptor Traveller Sleeping Bag Liner with Insect Shield
long_description: The Sea to Summit CoolMax Adaptor Traveller Sleeping Bag Liner with Insect Shield has built-in invisible insect protection to repel mosquitoes, ticks, fleas and flies while you sleep.
short_description: The Sea to Summit CoolMax Adaptor Traveller Sleeping Bag Liner with Insect Shield has built-in invisible insect protection to repel mosquitoes, ticks, fleas and flies while you sleep.
